about_the_game:
Taxi Copter is a precise platform game that will test your dexterity in a pixel art style.
Relax with retro beat music in a modern form, prepared especially for you.

Avoid the pigeons. Remember that every collision, hard landing or passenger push results in the loss of points and irreparable damage to the helicopter!

Let's go, a big city full of passengers awaits!
Transport everyone!
detailed_description:
Taxi Copter is a precise platform game that will test your dexterity in a pixel art style.
Relax with retro beat music in a modern form, prepared especially for you.

Avoid the pigeons. Remember that every collision, hard landing or passenger push results in the loss of points and irreparable damage to the helicopter!

Let's go, a big city full of passengers awaits!
Transport everyone!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS Sierra or later
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GT 640M
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 10.15 Catalina
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GT 640M
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

name: Taxi Copter

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8.1 or Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.0GHz or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2GB or better
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 8.1 or Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.0GHz or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2GB or bette

short_description: Take on the role of a Taxi Copter driver. Pick up passengers and drive them to their destination, avoid pigeons, earn money, get stars and unlock more levels. Fight against the gravity, be gentle, it's a helicopter, not a tank! A city full of passengers (and pigeons!) is waiting for you!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Bulgarian, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, Czech, Danish, Finnish, Greek, Dutch, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Romanian, Swedish, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese, Hungarian, Hindi
